RequestValidatorId.description: The ID for the request validator. For example: `abc123` .

description: The `AWS::ApiGateway::RequestValidator` resource sets up basic validation rules for incoming requests to your API. For more information, see [Enable Basic Request Validation for an API in API Gateway](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/api-gateway-method-request-validation.html) in the *API Gateway Developer Guide* .

RestApiId.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

ValidateRequestBody.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate a request body according to the configured Model schema.

ValidateRequestParameters.description: A Boolean flag to indicate whether to validate request parameters ( `true` ) or not ( `false` ).
